title: General Tips for Jayce as of 2015
body: I have a very basic understanding of Jayce and have formed some combos based on my own experiences and I know about simple things like Q before E to make its less predictable and farm with hammer to get mana back but is there anything else ?

replies.body: don't pick him and play irelia

"general tips"
buy a ward
farm minions
dont die

yer on your way 2 diamond
